definition.text: Each product might have one Plotter Module associated with it. This Plotter Module has all the definitions needed to interpret the Product's datasets and render the information at the charts.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos has the capability to allow it's users to create plotters without writing any code at all. The ploter is defined at the Designer Space, and by the means of defining vertices and polygons, users can create custom charts for any Dataset.
